item.title: KEY
item.description: score:1151 Chances: KeyCorp’s stock price bounced back strong in July, climbing 33%, outperforming major market indices. KeyBank introduces new products and services to enhance banking experience for consumers. KeyBank Foundation awards grant to Michigan Ability Partners for $175,000. KeyBank Community Development Lending and Investment (CDLI) supports construction of permanent supportive housing in Los Angeles.

item.title: LU
item.description: score:1005 Chances: Lufax Holding’s strong financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2023, with earnings and revenue surprises, indicate positive performance and potential growth. Notable upgrades by analysts suggest positive sentiment and market response to the company’s financial results, potentially boosting investor confidence.
